title: YOUR SHOP BUG
body:
My "YOUR SHOP" won't appear, I tried logging in and out, restarting my computer and nothing happens!
anyone having the same issue ?

replies.body: The personal shop ran into a few issues and the [**status page**](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#euw) shows that it's been temporarily disabled. No worries, it'll be back soon!
"back soon".....been down for 6 hours lol
Ayyyy, one day is pretty soon compared to 3 months! 6 hours relatively isn't that much time, considering most people sleep for longer periods xD
13 hours now.. no one notice from riot..

I wish we would get to know what awesome spagetti was involved in this, what was the issue?
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}} 
You could say it "bugs" me...
I am sorry, but for real, I want to know >.<

I'm not entirely sure what the whole problem entailed, but the shop should have just gone back up I believe! If you aren't seeing it, you might need to refresh the client. 

I'll see who I can poke around here to find out what happened though!
what do we do if we got new skins in "my shop" or new discounts that we don't like compared to what we had before the reset?
No worries, just hit us up in a ticket letting us know which offer you wanted to buy!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=cG9mWQeJ,comment-id=00010001000000000000,timestamp=2017-09-19T21:17:13.027+0000)
>
> No worries, just hit us up in a ticket letting us know which offer you wanted to buy!

I did it. With a photo of new and old shop. Dude, i only want my CHAMPIONSHIP {{champion:412}} . And now i cant buy him{{sticker:sg-lux-2}}[[](https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B8JEAXWLZXqBc2VVN2lvRzU5LUU)](https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B8JEAXWLZXqBRHZRQ1ZseHFPd3c)
We can still see which offers you had at first so no worries about the picture. Just wait for a response in your ticket and those EU agents should be able to help soon.
Thank you, In the page of report a bug? That´s the ticket?
No bug to report, just click here to submit a ticket -> [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)
How long will this ticket take?
It all just depends on the current size of their ticket queues.
what is the ticket type we use for this?
Shouldn't matter really tbh, but try to pick the one about making purchases if you can!
My "your shop" is missing. It was there yesterday now it is gone, it replaced with "worlds missions/loot"! Please can someone tell me how to get it back??
what was the issue? will the shop be up soon?

why do u have to refresh the shop after you fixed it? WHY? i loved the skins i had and didnt get a chance to buy them. you just took the 4 best skins out of my shop and changed them into completly different ones i dont wanna. Especialy championship Zed, which i really wanted is now gone and i cant even buy him in the normal shop. This doesnt seem fair, cause i bought RP for that skin and now i cant buy it, cause it is a championship skin. Its like baiting into gettin' RP:(
Will they reset the SHOP ? I BOUGHT RP JUST TO BUY CHAMPIONSHIP ZED FROM THE SHOP !!

same me with championship{{champion:412}} 
GL dude...

I got my " Your Shop " back, but now it has different discounts and skins, augh!

Please help.
i know I have the same issue and I am so mad!!! I just contacted riot support because I just bought RP to get challenger ahri and winter wonderland ori

> [{quoted}](name=Stargírl,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=cG9mWQeJ,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2017-09-19T21:11:59.175+0000)
>
> i know I have the same issue and I am so mad!!! I just contacted riot support because I just bought RP to get challenger ahri and winter wonderland ori

I wnat my old shop too. Wit for a answer form Riot...{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}

> [{quoted}](name=Thunder Fuk,realm=EUW,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=cG9mWQeJ,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-09-18T22:08:08.567+0000)
>
> My &quot;YOUR SHOP&quot; won&#039;t appear, I tried logging in and out, restarting my computer and nothing happens!
> anyone having the same issue ?

me too
Currently, Your Shop is disabled due to a bug that I have no information off, they are working on a fix and it will be ready whenever it is live again!{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}
